root.text_male: Mmm, what is going on Alex? Why are you still here?

root.text: What's going on? The door won't open.
Have they locked me in the bathroom? ANA!!! ALEX!! ANYONE!!
What do I do now? I have to get out of here.

getOut.text: I have to get out of here.

root.text: This is the latch, but it won't open.
Have they locked me in the toilet? ANA!!! ALEX!! ANYONE!!
Agh!! I've just hit the sink. FUUUUCK!!
It's wet... but this is the floor.
Lights are back!! And I can hear something in the corridor. I should have been able to get out already.

teacher.text: What are you doing here locked?

meetingFS.text: Today I had a meeting with your parents and they've told me everything.
You could have told me directly.
I guess it was Alex who locked you in the toilet right?
He's going to be expelled for 3 days. If he keeps troubling you when he's back, you must tell me.
If he carries on like this we could get him expelled from school for good, or even call the police and take legal actions against him.
Go home and get some rest.

noMeetingFS.text: (Tell about everything Alex has done to you)

snitchNoMeetingFS.text: Why didn't you tell me all this before?
I'm going to call your parents to speak about it.
And we'll see what we can do with Alex.
I'll try to get him expelled for 3 days.
And if anything happens don't hesitate to speak with me or the school counselor.
Go home and get some rest.

noSnitchNoMeetingFS.text: Well, go home. But remember this...
If some mocks you just let me or the school counselor know about it.
Look for help, things are not going to change by themselves, just can get worse.

meetingNoFS.text: (Tell about everything Alex has done to you)

snitchMeetingNoFS.text: Why didn't you tell me earlier?
Besides, today I had a meeting with your parents and we've talked about it.
With all you have told me... I'll talk to the principal to expell Alex for 3 days.
If he keeps harassing you, both in person or social media, just let me know.
If he carries on like this we could get him expelled from school for good, or even call the police and take legal actions against him.
Go home and get some rest.

noSnitchMeetingNoFSMaria.text: I had a meeting with your parents and it seems you had some trouble with Alex.
Also, María and the school counselor came to tell me Alex is picking on you.
You don't need to hide anything and you're not snitch when you ask for help. Alex behaviour suggests that a punishment is needed.
We've decided to expel Alex for 3 days.
If he carries on like this we could get him expelled from school for good, or even call the police and take legal actions against him.

noSnitchMeetingNoFSNoMaria.text: Today I had a meeting with your parents, They're worried.
If you're having troubles with any of your classmates you should talk to me or the school counselor.
If you reject our help things might get worse.
In any case, you don't deserve to be mocked and ridiculed.
If that's what is happening, ask for help or things will keep the same.

snitchNoMeetingNoFSMaria.text: Why didn't you tell me before?
Also, María and the school counselor came to tell me what you've just said.
She cares about you, we all need friends like her.
Alex behaviour deserves a punishment and it's important that you've told me everything.
This is not your fault, nor deserve it.
We've decided to expel Alex for 3 days.
If he carries on like this we could get him expelled from school for good, or even call the police and take legal actions against him.
Go back home and get some rest.

snitchNoMeetingNoFSNoMaria.text: I'll talk with your parents about it.
If you still have troubles with Alex come and tell me, tomorrow I'll tell him off.
It's important you speak about it, time it's not going to change things for good by itself.
In any case, you don't deserve to be mocked and ridiculed.
Things won't change until you ask for help, or might even get worse.

noSnitchNoMeetingNoFS.text: But remember this: if you're having any trouble with anyone and don't look for help, it will get worse for sure.
In any case, you don't deserve to be mocked and ridiculed.
Things won't change until you ask for help.
